casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
De'Norris L. SANDERS. No. 226P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. De'Norris L. Sanders, Pro Se. Dahr Joseph Tanoury, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 25th day of April 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2006."
